title: Kubernetes Observability
description: Learn techniques for inspecting Kubernetes and your applications distributed across a cluster.

courses.title: Logging with EFK
courses.description: Learn how to implement centralized logging using an ElasticsSearch, Fluent Bit, and Kibana (EFK) stack on Kubernetes.

courses.title: Scaling Your Applications, Automatically
courses.description: Discover how the Horizontal Pod Autoscalar (HPA) can keep your customers happy while saving you money.

courses.title: Prometheus (coming soon)
courses.description: Learn how to monitor applications on Kubernetes.

courses.title: Transaction tracing (coming soon)
courses.description: Learn how to trace applications on Kubernetes.
